articles.content: There are various phenomena which light up our sky, the most common being auroras. But auroras or Northern Lights aren't the only phenomenon which can mesmerize people. Transient Luminous Events (TLE… [+1894 chars]

articles.author: Amit Malewar
articles.title: Rare discovery: 2 supermassive black holes spotted on a collision course inside a galaxy merger - Tech Explorist
articles.description: Finding such a system is difficult.
articles.content: Galaxy mergers produce pairs of supermassive black holes (SMBHs), which may be witnessed as dual quasars if both SMBHs are rapidly accreting. The kiloparsec (kpc)-scale separation represents a physic… [+3825 chars]
